<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// There is nothing more restrictive than private linkage.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (GV.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globalvalue/#a3ed4c5535997ad77ffee00f92430b576">hasPrivateLinkage</a>())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Conservatively append user-supplied runtime library functions (supplied</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// either directly, or via a function alias) to llvm.compiler.used.  These</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// could be internalized and deleted by optimizations like -globalopt,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// causing problems when later optimizations add new library calls (e.g.,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// llvm.memset =&gt; memset and printf =&gt; puts).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Leave it to the linker to remove any dead code (e.g. with -dead&#95;strip).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><Highlight kind="normal">    GlobalValue &#42;FuncAliasee = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;GlobalAlias&gt;</a>(GV)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;GlobalAlias&gt;</a>(&amp;GV);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><Highlight kind="normal">      FuncAliasee = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;Function&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>-&gt;getAliasee());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ((<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;Function&gt;</a>(GV) || FuncAliasee) &amp;&amp; Libcalls.count(GV.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#adb5c319f5905c1d3ca9eb5df546388c5">getName</a>())) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><Highlight kind="normal">      LLVMUsed.push&#95;back(&amp;GV);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><Highlight kind="normal">    SmallString&lt;64&gt; Buffer;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><Highlight kind="normal">    TM.getNameWithPrefix(Buffer, &amp;GV, Mangler);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (AsmUndefinedRefs.count(Buffer))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><Highlight kind="normal">      LLVMUsed.push&#95;back(&amp;GV);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// namespace anonymous</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a3eafdf4086ad15ab08757d26e91d3b46"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a3eafdf4086ad15ab08757d26e91d3b46">llvm::updateCompilerUsed</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a> &amp;TheModule, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetmachine">TargetMachine</a> &amp;TM,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><Highlight kind="normal">                              </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringset">StringSet&lt;&gt;</a> &amp;AsmUndefinedRefs) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::vector&lt;GlobalValue &#42;&gt; UsedValues;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-updatecompilerused-cpp-/preservelibcallsandasmused/#adb4cdb7eddf05c3279a4bf431ecb91ad">PreserveLibCallsAndAsmUsed</a>(AsmUndefinedRefs, TM, UsedValues)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><Highlight kind="normal">      .findInModule(TheModule);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
